mapper.insert: insert into photo (p_name,p_seq,p_id,p_content) values (#{p_name},(select coalesce((select max(p_seq) from photo where p_name=#{p_name})+1,0) from dual),#{p_id},#{p_content})
mapper.select: select p_seq,p_id,p_content from photo where p_name=#{societyname} order by p_seq asc
mapper.delete: delete from photo where p_seq=#{p_seq} and p_name=#{societyname}
